alert.note: Alert for Gates of the Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 10:39AM MST until December 23 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains and the Little Belt and Highwood Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, until 3 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gates of the Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
